info.title: TON API
info.description: API for interacting with The Open Network (TON) blockchain

get.description: Retrieves information about an address from the address book

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The address to look up in the address book

name.description: The name associated with the address

description.description: A description of the address or associated entity

icon.description: URL of an icon associated with the address
